severely new English phrases and words

calm
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 90 in today's
episode I have a new idiom for you to
have the gift of the gab let's find out
what it means and how you can use it in
your daily conversation to have the gift
of the gab you often come across people
who are good with words they speak very
well and sound very convincing the idiom
to have the gift of the gab basically
means to have the ability to speak
confidently and convincingly if you have
the gift of the gab you can actually
persuade people to do what you want you
do this by speaking in a persuasive and
an interesting manner so the people are
keen to listen to you you are a smooth
talker and managed to convince people to
believe you in short a person with great
verbal communication skills has the gift
of the gab
for example the Hawker on the street
convinces the passers-by to buy his
products even though they are not of a
superior quality he does this by talking
smoothly and convincingly to his
prospective buyers ok now that you know
what this idiom means let's take a look
at some example sentences to see how you
can use it in your daily conversation
example one the speaker at the
conference had the gift of the gab he
could retain the audience's attention
and tackled all the questions asked to
him very effectively example 2 with his
gift of the gab William calmed down his
girlfriend who was upset as she
suspected him of double-timing her
example 3 the fortune-teller
Hilda has the gift of the gab she knows
how to get people to go to her for
advice example 4 Smith makes a good car
marketer he is a smooth talker and his
gift of the gab helps him to achieve his
sales targets example 5 father told
Richard if you use your gift of the gab
at your court sessions I am sure one day
you will be a successful law example 6
michelle is a pleasant and a sincere
team leader unfortunately she doesn't
have the gift of the gab and is unable
to handle conflicts diplomatically at
work
example seven when Samantha wasn't
allowed to party her friends said do you
want me to seek permission from your
parents I'll manage to cajole them I've
got the gift of the gab example 8 my
boss has the gift of the gab he really
knows how to motivate us to work beyond
our office hours even though we are
exhausted
example 9 John is the most popular
teacher in school he has the gift of the
gab and can handle notorious children
with ease that's the end of today's
episode do any of your friends have the
gift of the gab and convinced you to do
things their way
kindly share your experiences in the
comment box below this video thank you
for watching us do watch all the

updated with all the latest lessons I

bye and take care
